meanings.definition: At all times; on all occasions.
meanings.sent1: She alway wears her favorite hat.
meanings.sent2: He alway greets everyone with a smile.
meanings.sent3: The cat alway sits in the sunniest spot.
meanings.sent4: His enthusiasm for learning alway shines through.
meanings.sent5: The stars alway twinkle in the night sky.

meanings.sent1: The river flows alway, never stopping.
meanings.sent2: The clock ticks alway, marking the passing time.
meanings.sent3: The music plays alway in the background.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter fills the room alway.
meanings.sent5: The wind whispers alway through the trees.
